description: Allows for the creation and removal of volume to host mappings for NetApp E-series storage arrays.

target.description: The name of host or hostgroup you wish to assign to the mapping

api_username.description: The username used to authenticate against the API. This can optionally be set via an environment variable, API_USERNAME

api_password.description: The password used to authenticate against the API. This can optionally be set via an environment variable, API_PASSWORD

target_type.description: Whether the target is a host or group.

state.description: Present will ensure the mapping exists, absent will remove the mapping.

volume_name.description: The name of the volume you wish to include in the mapping.

api_url.description: The full API url. Example: http://ENDPOINT:8080/devmgr/v2

lun.description: The LUN number you wish to give the mapping
